title: Evidence-Based Instructional Design to Enhance Biochemistry MOOC Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biochemistry knowledge and college-level understanding of life sciences
context.additional_context: A blended learning course optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain biochemical concepts and experimental principles with over 80% precision through evidence-based learning strategies
Learners can present three or more problem-solving processes for complex biochemical problems through online discussions and collaborative learning
Learners can identify individual learning gaps through periodic formative assessments and develop improvement plans within two weeks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
